title: Medicine Man Recipe
full_text:
Medicine Man Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
white rum
3/4
ounce
fresh lemon juice
(from
1
whole
lemon
)
1/2
ounce
maple syrup
1/4
teaspoon
smoked paprika
4
sage leaves
, divided
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add white rum, lemon juice, maple syrup, paprika, and 3 sage leaves. Shake well for 30 seconds.
Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with final sage leaf.
Special Equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
